Title: Relates to the criminal sale of a controlled substance to a person less than fourteen years of age
Summary: Provides that criminal sale of a controlled substance by an adult to a person less than fourteen years of age is a class A-II felony.
LawCode: Amd ยง220.48, add ยง220.49, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the criminal sale of a controlled substance to a person less than fourteen years of age
